top.title: Hong Kong tower blocks fire death toll rises to 128
top.summary: Authorities say 89 bodies are unidentified and 79 people remain injured after Wednesday's blaze.

top.title: Trump says US will pause migration from 'third-world countries'
top.summary: The president did not name which countries would be affected, but vowed to remove anyone "not a net asset" to the US.

top.title: National Guard member dies after shooting in Washington DC
top.summary: Sarah Beckstrom, 20, succumbed to her injuries, while a second guardsman remains in critical condition, Donald Trump says.

top.title: OBR calls in cyber expert over botched release of Budget analysis
top.summary: Rachel Reeves's statement was thrown into chaos after journalists were able to access the document early.

top.title: Nvidia plays down Google chip threat concerns
top.summary: The world's most valuable company said it was still "a generation ahead of the industry".

top.title: Ofcom vows to name and shame platforms over online sexism
top.summary: But critics say the regulator's new measures need to be the law rather than guidelines to make the internet safer for women and girls.
